input.sentences: i awoke to a snow covered world .
the ducks did n't understand where the water had gone .
i just sheared the sheep last week . i should have waited .
i left the tractor out overnight . now its almost unrecognizable .
i have plenty of fuel for the generators . we will stay warm through the cold .
output.sentences: Overnight the world got covered in snow.
We walked the property and saw the ducks were not happy with the situation.
The sheep on the otherhand, had no issues with the new white stuff.
We came across our tractor and almost didn't recognize it with all the snow on it.
checking the propain heater though, looks like we are good to go for awhile as anothe snow storm is on the way.
